name: A Scullion's Scheme
description:
Will Scully, the scullion, be able to use his low-class position to work around the castle and learn how to take forth his revenge on the king? Find out now in this witty, dialogue-based medieval adventure! 

There are some hiccups in the game as we were scrambling for time and faced some other challenges. To avoid any major bugs:

  • meet the knight on the left-side first
  • do not move while in the elevator
  • do not throw items near the edge of the floors. 

Thank you for understanding!

Controls: 

x - interact/select

right/left - move

up/down - navigate floors

This game was made for the BlackthornProd Game Jam #3 (2021).  Definitely keen to polish this one up!
